Author: dimxy#2587
Content:
What I am still concerned with is how to get the cashout price.
it was suggested to use the smoothed price at the cashout moment for it.
But smoothed price is calculated as 24h-period-averaged value and it is actually correlated to raw price at 24h ago point. 
So at the cashout moment the actual raw price might be high, but we may get it it as low just because it was also low 24h ago.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is the average value of DAYWINDOW

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is correlated to the average value, so maybe 12 hours ago if it is a steady increase/decline

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: since we calculate the costbasis from the smoothed, what is wrong with using smoothed for cashout?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: for longer term positions, it wont really matter that much

Author: dimxy#2587
Content: ok, I'll make changes and let's see what we get as profits/losses and compare it with the chart

Author: Markus#5464
Content: @jl777c how does the whole concept look like? will u be able to bet on any crypto either going up or down? will u pay with that crypto u bet on and get paid in that crypto or will there be a standard coin/token used?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: for now you bet in the native coin, but we plan to add token betting

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: with token betting you could then bet the supported gateways CC coins

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you can bet long or short, with margin for any synthetic you can construct out of the prices at http://159.69.45.70:8050/

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @dimxy you will need to have some global exposure based limiting of positionsize leverage

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it wont be possible to be exact but you should be able to deterministically calculate the total amount of bets that are possible to accept in a given block

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then using that to approve/reject bets during validation

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this way, we can avoid the system being bankrupted no matter what and if people want to allow more bets, additional funds need to be able to be added to the global balance

Author: dimxy#2587
Content: so it probably should take into account existing bets and  total bankroll  amount and set some bet limit to protect bankroll to go negative?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so at first only small bets would be able to do maxleverage

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but as people get rekt the bankroll gets bigger and people can bet more and more

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I want to make a REKT as a sidechain for BET, and then have the profits go to snapshot payments CC

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if you are allowing more funds to be added, but each is treated as an independent bet? with the 24hrs scanning for MAX costbasis

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: otherwise future knowledge is being used with the addition of funds

Author: dimxy#2587
Content: For a new added bet I calculate a new costbasis beginning from the block where the bet was added and for 24h  (as max value)
